name: Full Bokko Youchien English
description:
This is a short story about Mitarou and his best friend Kotomi. It was supposed to be another fun day but...  

This game contains violent and grotesque depictions.                                                                                                                                                                  

This is a fan made translation by RPGVeir.                                                                            Developer is Nekofuji Kaoru.

Developer site: http://nekocharon.web.fc2.com/

Contact me: rpgveir@gmail.com

Update 25-04: Fixed some in game typos and added "zip" format in download section. Now You can download either rar or zip archive format.
